properties.title: Apache Directory Project: Contributors
properties.description: Ersin Er contributes to the Apache Directory Project, which aims to produce a high performance and production quality LDAP server written in Java.

section.name: Ersin Er
section.p: Ersin works on LDAP subproject. He has contributed several parsers for some recent additions like Subentry and Access Control subsystems. He also works on LDAP Triggers, Stored Procedures and Views which will make LDAP and Apache Directory Server even more powerful.

subsection.name: Some Background
subsection.p: Ersin was looking around for a good master's thesis subject and one day he met Alex Karasulu. He's now building his thesis around LDAP and Apache Directory Project in particular.
Ersin lives in Ankara, Turkiye. He is a research assistant and graduate student at Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Hacettepe University. He likes listening to 80's!
